meanings.sent1: The townees gathered at the community center for a meeting.
meanings.sent2: The townees enjoy shopping at the local stores.
meanings.sent3: The townees decided to have a picnic in the town square.
meanings.sent4: The townees are the heartbeat of the town.
meanings.sent5: The townees take pride in their town and its history.

meanings.definition: The people who live in a town.
meanings.sent1: Townees often know each other well in a small town.
meanings.sent2: The townees celebrated the annual town festival together.
meanings.sent3: The townees organized a bake sale to raise funds for a new park.
meanings.sent4: The townees form a close-knit community.
meanings.sent5: The townees support local businesses by shopping locally.
